languages.text: "Будет исполнено, Лорд-капитан. Абордажная команда немедленно направится по вашим координатам. Их экипируют резаками, чтобы проникнуть сквозь остов корабля, добраться до реактора и обеспечить взрывную перегрузку, которая уничтожит судно. Потери в ходе операции не должны быть велики".

traits.locale_text: "Будет исполнено, Лорд-капитан. Абордажная команда немедленно направится по вашим координатам. Их экипируют резаками, чтобы проникнуть сквозь остов корабля, добраться до реактора и обеспечить взрывную перегрузку, которая уничтожит судно. Потери в ходе операции не должны быть велики".
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "It will be done, Lord Captain. A boarding party will immediately be dispatched to the provided coordinates. They will be equipped with cutters so they can penetrate the ship's hull, get to the reactor, and initiate a cascading overload that will destroy the vessel. The losses incurred by the operation should be negligible."
languages.original_text: "Будет исполнено, Лорд-капитан. Абордажная команда немедленно направится по вашим координатам. The losses incurred by the operation should not be severe."

traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « Ce sera fait, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Un groupe d'abordage va se rendre immédiatement aux coordonnées fournies. Équipés de découpeurs, ils ouvriront une brèche dans la coque du vaisseau, progresseront jusqu'au réacteur et déclencheront une explosion en chaîne qui l'anéantira totalement. Nous anticipons des pertes minimes. »
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain. A boarding party will immediately be dispatched to the provided coordinates. They will be equipped with cutters so they can penetrate the ship's hull, get to the reactor, and initiate a cascading overload that will destroy the vessel. The losses incurred by the operation should be negligible."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sera fait, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Un groupe d'abordage va se rendre immédiatement aux coordonnées fournies. Équipés de découpeurs, ils ouvriront une brèche dans la coque du vaisseau, progresseront jusqu'au réacteur et déclencheront une explosion en chaîne qui l'anéantira totalement. Nous anticipons des pertes minimes. »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “遵命，舰长大人。我们将立即派遣一支登舰队伍前往目标坐标。他们会携带切割机，用来切割船体，抵达反应堆。随后，他们会启动级联过载，将飞船彻底摧毁。这次行动造成的损失应该可以忽略不计。”
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain. A boarding party will immediately be dispatched to the provided coordinates. They will be equipped with cutters so they can penetrate the ship's hull, get to the reactor, and initiate a cascading overload that will destroy the vessel. The losses incurred by the operation should be negligible."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，舰长大人。我们将立即派遣一支登舰队伍前往目标坐标。他们会携带切割机，用来切割船体，抵达反应堆。随后，他们会启动级联过载，将飞船彻底摧毁。这次行动造成的损失应该可以忽略不计。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Wird erledigt, Lord Captain. Es wird augenblicklich eine Entermannschaft an die angegebenen Koordinaten geschickt. Wir rüsten sie mit Cuttern aus, damit sie den Rumpf des Schiffs durchringen und zum Reaktor gelangen können. Dort werden sie eine kaskadierende Überlastung auslösen, die das Schiff zerstört. Die Verluste auf unserer Seite dürften zu vernachlässigen sein."
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain. A boarding party will immediately be dispatched to the provided coordinates. They will be equipped with cutters so they can penetrate the ship's hull, get to the reactor, and initiate a cascading overload that will destroy the vessel. The losses incurred by the operation should be negligible."

traits.locale_text: "Wird erledigt, Lord Captain. Es wird augenblicklich eine Entermannschaft an die angegebenen Koordinaten geschickt. Wir rüsten sie mit Cuttern aus, damit sie den Rumpf des Schiffs durchringen und zum Reaktor gelangen können. Dort werden sie eine kaskadierende Überlastung auslösen, die das Schiff zerstört. Die Verluste auf unserer Seite dürften zu vernachlässigen sein."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «Así se hará, Lord Capitán. Enviaré un equipo de abordaje a las coordenadas proporcionadas de inmediato. Irán equipados con sopletes, lo que les permitirá perforar el casco de la nave, llegar al reactor e iniciar una sobrecarga progresiva para destruirla. Esta operación no debería ocasionar demasiadas pérdidas».
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain. A boarding party will immediately be dispatched to the provided coordinates. They will be equipped with cutters so they can penetrate the ship's hull, get to the reactor, and initiate a cascading overload that will destroy the vessel. The losses incurred by the operation should be negligible."

traits.locale_text: «Así se hará, Lord Capitán. Enviaré un equipo de abordaje a las coordenadas proporcionadas de inmediato. Irán equipados con sopletes, lo que les permitirá perforar el casco de la nave, llegar al reactor e iniciar una sobrecarga progresiva para destruirla. Esta operación no debería ocasionar demasiadas pérdidas».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「了解です、ロード・キャプテン。乗り込み部隊を直ちに示された座標に派遣します。切断機を持たせるので、船体を突き破ってリアクターまで行き、どんどん強まる過負荷を起こして船を破壊できるでしょう。その影響で被る損失は小さいものです」
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain. A boarding party will immediately be dispatched to the provided coordinates. They will be equipped with cutters so they can penetrate the ship's hull, get to the reactor, and initiate a cascading overload that will destroy the vessel. The losses incurred by the operation should be negligible."

traits.locale_text: 「了解です、ロード・キャプテン。乗り込み部隊を直ちに示された座標に派遣します。切断機を持たせるので、船体を突き破ってリアクターまで行き、どんどん強まる過負荷を起こして船を破壊できるでしょう。その影響で被る損失は小さいものです」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Emredersiniz Lord Kaptan. İletilen koordinatlara derhâl bir bordalama ekibi gönderilecek. Kesicilerle donatılacaklar ki geminin gövdesini aşabilsinler, reaktöre ulaşabilsinler ve gemiyi yok edecek aşırı yükleme silsilesini başlatabilsinler. Operasyonun sebep olacağı kayıplar göz ardı edilebilir düzeyde olacak."
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain. A boarding party will immediately be dispatched to the provided coordinates. They will be equipped with cutters so they can penetrate the ship's hull, get to the reactor, and initiate a cascading overload that will destroy the vessel. The losses incurred by the operation should be negligible."
